name: fit-sandbox-cli
description: AI coding sandbox CLI - manage Docker sandboxes with Git Worktree isolation

scripts.build:
esbuild src/cli.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=dist/sandbox.cjs && printf '#!/bin/bash
exec node "$(dirname "$0")/sandbox.cjs" "$@"
' > dist/sandbox && chmod +x dist/sandbox
